chapter.title: Checking Signature Expiration
chapter.para: It is important to regularly check your zone for signatures that are nearing expiration. If the signatures are close to expiring, or already have expired, see for how to resign the zone.

section.title: Check the Zone for Expiring Signatures
section.para: This checks the keyrec file to see if the zone has signatures expiring in the next 10 days.
It would be good to run this command regularly. The cron command can be set to execute expchk at regular intervals.
